title: A First Look at DataStax Vector - AIOps for Apache Cassandra™
description:
Join DataStax product leaders Aaron Morton, Patricia Gorla, and Patrick McFadin for a first look at DataStax Vector, an AI Ops service for Apache Cassandra™. This is the fast-track to expert level operation of Cassandra without the years of experience. 

CONNECT WITH DATASTAX
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/c/datastaxdevs?sub_confirmation=1 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/datastaxdevs
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/datastaxdevs

ABOUT DATASTAX DEVELOPERS
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Create an account on https://academy.datastax.com to watch our free online courses, tutorials, and more.
